name: ao-learn
description: Advice-Only LMS static site with v2 JSON merger

scripts.build: node scripts/merge_content.mjs && node scripts/merge_assessments.mjs dist/site.v2.json dist/site.v2.json && mkdir -p dist && cp dist/site.v2.json site.json && cp dist/site.v2.json dist/site.json
scripts.publish: npm run build && mkdir -p docs && cp index.html docs/index.html && cp site.json docs/site.json
